document_data.name: Malil Entwine
document_data.mainbody: '''Malil Entwine''' was a business owner and a mayor of a [[Chondath|Chondathan]] fishing town of [[Samra]] ''circa'' [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Description: The mayor was a quiet and timid man whose bark was worse than his bite. Malil's biting words were rarely backed up by actions. Mayor Entwin made sure Samra's taxes made their way to [[Arrabar]] in a timely and secure manner according to schedule.
document_data.History: Malil Entwine was an elected official in Samra, who joined the city's ruling council of elders sometimes in or before the {{YearlinkName|1370}}. Malil's political career sprouted from owning a local fishery.
